<div id="barrabusca">
  <input id="searchbar" onkeyup="busca_entrada()" type="text"
  name="search" placeholder="Buscar...">
</div>

<style>
#barrabusca {
z-index: 999;
width: 50%;
position: absolute;
top: 0px;
right: 0px; 
}
#searchbar{
padding:03px;
border-radius: 10px;
width: 50%;  
z-index: 999;   
margin-left: 30px;
margin-top: 30px;
}
hr {
overflow: visible; padding: 0;
border: none;
border-top: medium double #333;
color: #333;
text-align: center;
}
img {
border: 1px solid black;
}
#header {
margin-top: 80px;
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 1000px){

img {
width: 280px; height: 200px; 
}
#TOC {
display: none;
}
#searchbar{
padding:03px;
border-radius: 10px;
width: 50%;  
z-index: 999;   
margin-left: 30px;
margin-top: 2px;
float:right;
}
#barrabusca {
float:right;
justify-content: right;
}
#header {
margin-top: 25px;
}
.toc-ignore {
  padding: 5px;
}
}
</style>
<script>
function busca_entrada() {
    let input = document.getElementById('searchbar').value
    input=input.toLowerCase();
    let x = document.getElementsByClassName('section level1');
    let x2 = document.getElementsByClassName('section level2');
    
      
    for (i = 0; i < x.length; i++) { 
        if (!x[i].innerText.toLowerCase().includes(input)) {
            x[i].style.display="none"; 

        }
        else {
            x[i].style.display="contents";
            for (a = 0; a < x2.length; a++){
                if (!x2[a].innerText.toLowerCase().includes(input)){
                    x2[a].style.display="none"; 
                }
                else {
                    x2[a].style.display="contents";

                }
            }
        }
    }
}
  </script>
